channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for CO
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for CO

item.title: Report X-2024021137
item.description:
Report X-2024021137

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-21T15:11:40+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-10
  • City: HENDERSON
  • State: CO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: QA was called to the unload trailer 561508 due to a leaking hazmat, outer carton was leaking and QA placed inside a lined tote and took to hazmat cage to get inspected. DescribePack: Closures came loos inside carton which caused the liquid leak out and soil outer carton and inner bottles. DurationRel: 21 and MitigateEffect: Pkg. was placed inside a lined tote and was taken to hazmat cage.

  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Leaking package discovered during sortation. Package placed in lined hazmat tote and sent to QA. DescribePack: Plastic jugs in corrugated carton. Loose cap came off one jug and contents spilled, damaging carton. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package placed in lined hazmat tote and sent to QA.

item.title: Report X-2024020777
item.description:
Report X-2024020777

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-21T15:11:40+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-06
  • City: HENDERSON
  • State: CO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Pkg. came to QA on IC belt inside a tote with outer carton torn and cans were outside carton and some were inside carton and QA pulled to inspect and upon inspection there was no diamond labels on outer carton indicating that this was a hazardous material inside carton, this was an undeclared shipment some inner cans were punctured and some had caps cracked. DescribePack: Inner cans had plastic caps cracked and some of the inner cans let out some liquid due to caps breaking and some inner cans were punctured as well. DurationRel: 19 and MitigateEffect: Pkg was placed inside a lined tote to get inspected and a Hess done.

item.title: Report X-2024021014
item.description:
Report X-2024021014

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-21T15:11:40+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-06
  • City: HENDERSON
  • State: CO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was being loaded onto a van then brought to QA due to signs of internal leakage. DescribePack: Discovered 2-1 Gal of Sizzle scale remover leaking due to loose caps. About 10 Floz was lost. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package was placed in a hazmat tote and upright to contain leakage.

item.title: Report X-2024021027

Report X-2024021027

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-08
  • City: HENDERSON
  • State: CO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Leaking package discovered during sortation. Package placed in lined hazmat tote and sent to QA. DescribePack: Metal jerrican in corrugated inner and outer cartons with plastic blister packs and paper filler. Loose cap on jerrican allowed leakage which soiled other product and damaged cartons. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package placed in lined hazmat tote and sent to QA.

item.title: Report X-2024020948
item.description:
Report X-2024020948

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-20T15:11:27+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-05
  • City: AURORA
  • State: CO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Pkg was being unloaded and was dropped causing the metal pail to get dented and fluid started leaking out of the base seam of the pail. It was placed in a lined hazmat tote and taken to the damaged hazmat area. DescribePack: The seam at the base of the metal pail was slightly coming apart allowing the liquid to leak slowly DurationRel: 16 and MitigateEffect: Placing the pail upright inside of the tote somewhat blocked the open seam and slowed the leaking down.

item.title: Report X-2024020425
item.description:
Report X-2024020425

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-16T15:14:16+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-21
  • City: HENDERSON
  • State: CO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: QA was called to unload trailer 955930 and pkg was on ground leaking and outer carton was wet. DescribePack: Inner closures came loose and the barcode was not readable had to get tracking # off the OP-900 and pkg. was placed inside hazmat cage inside the tote upside down after it was damaged. DurationRel: 13 and MitigateEffect: Closures came loose and liquid leaked out soiling inner bottles and outer carton.

item.title: Report X-2024020600
item.description:
Report X-2024020600

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-16T15:14:16+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-11
  • City: AURORA
  • State: CO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The damage was discovered in the unload. The unload manager called out for an Admin's assistance in containing the damaged hazmat. DescribePack: One of the four bottles in this shipment had a loose cap, which in turn caused that bottle to leak half of its contents. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The responding Admin contained the shipment in a hazardous material spill tote and transported it to the hazmat cage for processing.

item.title: Report X-2024020783
item.description:
Report X-2024020783

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-16T15:14:16+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-30
  • City: GLENWOOD SPRINGS
  • State: CO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package pulled off trailer, loaded correctly with orientation arrows upwards and in correct hazmat loading area. The box was leaking a powder substance out and was placed into a hazmat bin for further evaluation. DescribePack: The inner plastic salvage drum was cracked inside packaging. The crack was located on the side wall of plastic drum and was around 2-3 inches long. DurationRel: 2 and MitigateEffect: It was placed into a hazmat bin.

One jug punctured at bottom corner (1/8 inch long tear in plastic) and spilled, soiling other jugs and damaging carton. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package sent to QA.
